I want to apologize for my behavior recently in this forum. I had "plagiarized" some internet material on the myths and wrongfulness of same sex marriage and homosexuality (as Ladywolf discovered about 2 weeks ago). Most of the time I try to "use my own words", but there have been instances where I have failed to do this. I ment nothing bad by this (I felt like some of these assertions were written better than I might have done). I will not do this anymore. Again, I apologize to all involved.PS: I have come to really enjoy coming to this board. The wide variety of opinions and stands here make this a very interesting place to come to. emoticon_xgood
Nothing wrong with using other peoples ideas, just give credit where credit is due. Good on you for apologizing.

That's very mature of you to admit your mistake Jaaaman. Don't underestimate your ability to understand things, and put things in your own words. You could also link anything copied, or just state someone else wrote something, but it expresses your own feelings or ideas well.

Appology accepted.
 
 Glad you like coming here too...there are so many stimulating conversations aren't there?

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Public Apology
